section.title: GlobalSuppressions.cs
section.programlisting: 00001 // This file is used by Code Analysis to maintain SuppressMessage 00002 // attributes that are applied to this project. Project-level 00003 // suppressions either have no target or are given a specific target 00004 // and scoped to a namespace, type, member, etc. 00005 // 00006 // To add a suppression to this file, right-click the message in the 00007 // Error List, point to "Suppress Message(s)", and click "In Project 00008 // Suppression File". You do not need to add suppressions to this 00009 // file manually. 00010 00011 [assembly: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Design", "CA1017:MarkAssembliesWithComVisible")]
